++ Emergent Programming

EP is a concept where features come to exist through emergence rather than direct implementation. Emergence is where a feature emerges from various irrelevant components to make a desired behaviour.

Luc Steel has the best example of emergence.
http://cse.ucdavis.edu/~dynlearn/dynlearn/RoMADS/steels01/index.html
Especially this page:
http://cse.ucdavis.edu/~dynlearn/dynlearn/RoMADS/steels01/page2.html
